thread.title: From Paris to Netflix: The Long, Strange Journey of Orson Welles’ Last Movie, ‘The Other Side of the Wind’
thread.title_full: From Paris to Netflix: The Long, Strange Journey of Orson Welles’ Last Movie, ‘The Other Side of the Wind’

author: Andrew Lapin
title: From Paris to Netflix: The Long, Strange Journey of Orson Welles’ Last Movie, ‘The Other Side of the Wind’
text: For decades, numerous influential figures battled to get the famous director's unfinished final project to the screen. Now, thanks to Netflix, it may finally happen. Here's why it took so long.
